title: Clinical Psychologist (Freelance, Remote – UK)
shortDescription: Join Nova Clinic's remote network delivering autism and ADHD assessments with the full backing of our clinical operations team.
longDescription: Provide high-quality autism and ADHD assessments for children across the UK while enjoying total control over your schedule. We manage referrals, admin, and reporting so you can stay focused on outcomes.

title: Digital Marketing Assistant (Part-time, Remote)
shortDescription: Help us grow our online presence with creative campaigns, content optimization, and social storytelling.
longDescription: Work closely with the growth team to build campaigns that educate families and clinicians about Nova Clinic's services. You will own social calendars, email journeys, lightweight design requests, and reporting.

title: Care Coordinator (Full-time, Hybrid – London)
shortDescription: Be the first point of contact for families, supporting them through scheduling, preparation, and follow-up.
longDescription: Coordinate assessments end-to-end, making sure every family feels informed and cared for. You'll work with clinicians, schools, and partners to keep each case moving smoothly.

title: Product Designer (Contract, Remote)
shortDescription: Design intuitive clinician and family experiences that translate complex care workflows into simple journeys.
longDescription: Collaborate with product, engineering, and clinical SMEs to shape Nova Clinic's digital products. You'll lead discovery, design systems, and rapid prototyping for new patient-facing features.
